sections.heading: Short title.Section 29-3B-2 - Definitions
sections.text:
Sections 12 through 15 [29-3B-1 to 29-3B-4 NMSA 1978] of this act may be cited as the "Accurate Eyewitness Identification Act".

History:Laws 2019, ch. 211, § 12.

Effective dates.— Laws 2019, ch. 211, § 17 made Laws 2019, ch. 211, § 12 effective July 1, 2019.

sections.heading: Definitions.
Eyewitness identification procedures.
Training of law enforcement officers.
sections.text:
The secretary of public safety shall create, administer and conduct training programs for law enforcement officers and recruits on the methods and technical aspects of the eyewitness identification practices and procedures shown by reliable evidence to enhance the accuracy of eyewitness evidence referenced in the Accurate Eyewitness Identification Act.

History:Laws 2019, ch. 211, § 15.

Effective dates.— Laws 2019, ch. 211, § 17 made Laws 2019, ch. 211, § 12 effective July 1, 2019.
